content: *this eerie finger puppet is a scream to crochet during the halloween season featured in bk4k lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 80769ad corrections applied oct 10 2008 published in by kids for kids 910-100 microspun yarn lily white 1 ball crochet hook - size g-6 4 mm small amount of black embroidery thread worked in the round beginning at the head embroider eyes and mouth to finish
